content.text: Hi there, I'm 5'8" tall, but my dog is only 20 inches tall!
Hi, I'm 5'6" tall, but my dog is 40 inches tall!
Wow, that's a big dog! What kind is it?
She's a goldendoodle. She's a big sweetheart.
She sounds like a lot of fun! I have a chihuahua named Buddy. He's a little ball of energy.
I love chihuahuas! They're so cute and playful.
Yeah, they're great dogs. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my dog, go to the beach, and read.
Those all sound like great things to do. I like to read too, my favorite book is David Copperfield.
I've never read David Copperfield, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a great book, you should definitely check it out.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
